Package organisers

Class Auction

java.lang.Object
organisers.Auction
public class Auction
extends java.lang.Object
The class for storing all the relevant information about an auction, like how many participants are needed for the auction to start, or the maximum steps of bidding that are executed

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Auction()
    Constructor that initialises the number of signed up participants to 0
    Auction​(int idProduct, int noMaxSteps, int noParticipants)
    Constructor that initialises the product id, the number of maximum steps and the number of participants

  • Method Summary

    Gets the auction id

    Gets the ID of the product this auction was created for

    Gets the maximum bidding steps

    • Auction

      public Auction()
      Constructor that initialises the number of signed up participants to 0

    • Auction

      public Auction​(int idProduct, int noMaxSteps, int noParticipants)
      Constructor that initialises the product id, the number of maximum steps and the number of participants
      Parameters:
      idProduct - the id of the product
      noMaxSteps - the number of maximum bidding steps
      noParticipants - the number of required participants for the auction to start

    • getNoMaxSteps

      Gets the maximum bidding steps
